application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of provision of ducting space for full fibre connectivity infrastructure pursuant to condition 50 of planning permission ref: 223203FUL dated 31/01/2023 for: Construction of three  buildings, ranging in height from 4 to 20 storeys, to provide 188 mixed tenure residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor community space (Use Class F2(b)); construction of a new one-way access road, new under croft car park and landscaped podium to the car park; other landscape and public realm works; surface parking to accommodate existing car parking and blue badge parking and all other associated infrastructure works. (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)
